Text:
Good audio, but the HD capture is kinda stuttering. But with Shakespeare, the stuttering image isn't that big a deal.

If you want to see it without the stutter, you could buy it from http://www.digitaltheatre.com/production/details/much-ado-about-nothing-tennant-tate/overview

Thank you for this! I saw it here and then ended up buying it.  But, if you don't mind my asking, what you used to rip it to avi?  I've tried several programs, but they haven't worked.  I'd love to put my version on DVD and the digitial d/l won't allow it....
Unfortunately, the stuttering and the out-of-sync sound make this unwatchable. Hopefully, someone will upload again.

I adore you for uploading this!!  I saw this in London and the paint scene with David was unforgettable - and I was so glad to get to see it again!! 

The first 35 minutes are not in sync, but after that point it seems good.  Well worth the download if you don't want to buy it from the link posted.
